attributes.action: ensure Freeview can broadcast HDTV for free with the extra bandwidth from switchover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ofcom is to auction off the airwaves freed up by the digital switchover process to the higher bidders, probably phone companies and subscription TV services. This will mean Freeview will not be able to broadcast BBC/ITV services in HDTV. Why should we have to install an unsightly satellite to receive the latest TV technology? Freeview needs to be free HDTV!
